rx.internal.schedulers

类 ExecutorScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • rx.Scheduler
      • rx.internal.schedulers.ExecutorScheduler

  • public final class ExecutorScheduler
extends Scheduler
    Scheduler that wraps an Executor instance and establishes the Scheduler contract upon it.

    Note that thread-hopping is unavoidable with this kind of Scheduler as we don't know about the underlying threading behavior of the executor.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从类继承的嵌套类/接口 rx.Scheduler

    • 方法详细资料

      • createWorker

        public Scheduler.Worker createWorker()
        从类复制的说明: Scheduler
        Retrieves or creates a new Scheduler.Worker that represents serial execution of actions.

        When work is completed it should be unsubscribed using Subscription.unsubscribe().

        Work on a Scheduler.Worker is guaranteed to be sequential.

        指定者:
        createWorker 在类中 Scheduler
        返回:
        a Worker representing a serial queue of actions to be executed
